name: user_videos
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_v3.
Tool description: TikTok API
API description: Retrieves videos for a specified TikTok user using their `secUid` and `user_id`. Optionally, a cursor can be provided for pagination.

secuid.description: The secUid of the TikTok user.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the TikTok user.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination to get the subsequent set of videos. Defaults to None.
